issue.title: Isolated builds broken on default branch

content.raw: I don't know anything about your package and without further information I can't recommend anything. My only comment from reading the CMAKE snippets would be to consider using the standardized variable names (`INCLUDE_DIRS`, `LIBRARY_DIRS`) rathern then the singular version of it.
content.html: I don't know anything about your package and without further information I can't recommend anything. My only comment from reading the CMAKE snippets would be to consider using the standardized variable names (INCLUDE_DIRS, LIBRARY_DIRS) rathern then the singular version of it.
